cohortName: Chronic lymphoid leukemia referent incident cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (138379) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Chronic lymphoid leukemia referent prevalent cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (138379) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Chronic lymphoid leukemia design diagnostics 1 cohort
logicDescription: Chronic lymphoid leukemia, disease referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of updated concept set + descendants
